channel.title: Semiconductors on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Semiconductors on Archive 03

item.title: Fallen Giant Intel: A Comeback Story? Analyzing Opportunities and Pitfalls
item.description: Intel, the once-dominant semiconductor empire, is attempting a revival with its ‘IDM 2.0’ strategy. We conduct an in-depth analysis of Intel’s future, weighing the potential success of its foundry business and entry into the AI chip market against the technological uncertainty of its 18A process and a fiercely competitive landscape.

item.title: Nvidia Hits All-Time Highs: Bubble or Just the Beginning?
item.description: Nvidia has shattered its all-time high. Is this a celebration of the AI era, or a dangerous bubble? Kurumi’s optimism, fueled by the AI market’s structural growth and the powerful CUDA ecosystem, clashes head-on with Mikael’s warnings of extreme valuations and intensifying competition. Three unique characters engage in a fierce debate over Nvidia’s future.
